name: mega-charm
effect: Unused.  This appears as the girlplayer's Mega Bracelet in Pokémon Contests, but it cannot actually be obtained.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This charm contains an untold power that somehow
enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to
Mega Evolve in battle.

enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to
Mega Evolve in battle.
